Configuration.Name: Worldcat Discovery Search(Chromium)
Configuration.Author: Andy Huff(Original version), IDS Project(Chromium Update)
Configuration.Description: Performs a Worldcat Discovery search using a requests title, journal title, isxn or oclc number.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Defines whether the search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: WorldCatURL
Setting.Description: The URL for WorldCat Discovery. Do not include a trailing slash. ex: uofl.on.worldcat.org

Setting.name: SearchPriority
Setting.Description: Defines what order priority should be used when attempting to find a field to search by when using the auto search feature. Allowed fields are title, journaltitle, isxn, and oclc.
